org.jmol.util

Class Point4f

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.jmol.util.Tuple4f
      • org.jmol.util.Point4f
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Point4f
extends Tuple4f
    A 4 element point that is represented by single precision floating point x,y,z,w coordinates.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
